sentences.sContent: Out with every theory of human behavior, from linguistics to sociology.
sentences.sContent_eng: Out with every theory of human behavior, from linguistics to sociology.
sentences.sCn: 从语言学、社会学的人类行为原理里解脱吧。

sentences.sContent: Basic courses in sociology and psychology as well as other humanities courses give students plenty of opportunity to explore their own emotions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Basic courses in sociology and psychology as well as other humanities courses give students plenty of opportunity to explore their own emotions.
sentences.sCn: 社会学和心理学的基础，以及其他人文学科的课程，赋予学生大量的机会去探索其个人情感。

sentences.sContent: And I spent part of my second grade year in Sweden, where my father was on sabbatical as a professor of sociology.
sentences.sContent_eng: And I spent part of my second grade year in Sweden, where my father was on sabbatical as a professor of sociology.
sentences.sCn: 因为我父亲休假的缘故，我的小学二年级有一段时间是在瑞典上的，那个时候他是一名社会学教授。

phrases.pCn: 经济社会学；社会经济学
城市社会学，都市社会学

remMethod.val: soci(同伴， 结交) + ology(…学) → 社会学

words.tran: 社会的（等于sociologic）；社会学的；针对社会问题的
反社会的人；不爱社交的人
社会人际学；计量社会学

trans.tranOther: the scientific study of societies and the behaviour of people in groups
